Package com.djrapitops.plan.system.info.connection

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConnectionIn  
    ConnectionLog
    Class responsible for logging what ConnectionOut and ConnectionIn objects get as response.
    ConnectionLog.Entry  
    ConnectionOut
    Represents an outbound action request to another Plan server.
    ConnectionSystem
    ConnectionSystem manages out- and inbound InfoRequest connections.
    InfoRequestPageHandler
    PageHandler for /info/requestclassname pages.
    ProxyConnectionSystem
    ConnectionSystem for proxy servers.
    ServerConnectionSystem
    Connection system for Bukkit servers.
    WebExceptionLogger
    Class that decides what to do with WebExceptions.
